var render = function render() {
  var _vm = this,
    _c = _vm._self._c
  return _c(
    "ContentSlotsDistributor",
    { attrs: { "slot-key": _vm.$parent.slotKey } },
    [
      _c("h2", { attrs: { id: "_1-命令简介" } }, [
        _c(
          "a",
          { staticClass: "header-anchor", attrs: { href: "#_1-命令简介" } },
          [_vm._v("#")]
        ),
        _vm._v(" 1.命令简介"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v("ethtool（ethernet tool）查询或控制网络驱动程序和硬件设置。"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v(
          "利用 ethtool 可以根据需要更改以太网卡的参数，包括自动协商、速度、双工和局域网唤醒等参数。"
        ),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("h2", { attrs: { id: "_2-命令格式" } }, [
        _c(
          "a",
          { staticClass: "header-anchor", attrs: { href: "#_2-命令格式" } },
          [_vm._v("#")]
        ),
        _vm._v(" 2.命令格式"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("div", { staticClass: "language-shell extra-class" }, [
        _c("pre", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "language-shell" } }, [
          _c("code", [
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token function" } }, [
              _vm._v("ethtool"),
            ]),
            _vm._v(" "),
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token punctuation" } }, [
              _vm._v("["),
            ]),
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token operator" } }, [
              _vm._v("<"),
            ]),
            _vm._v("options"),
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token operator" } }, [
              _vm._v(">"),
            ]),
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token punctuation" } }, [
              _vm._v("]"),
            ]),
            _vm._v(" "),
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token punctuation" } }, [
              _vm._v("["),
            ]),
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token operator" } }, [
              _vm._v("<"),
            ]),
            _vm._v("devname"),
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token operator" } }, [
              _vm._v(">"),
            ]),
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token punctuation" } }, [
              _vm._v("]"),
            ]),
            _vm._v("\n"),
          ]),
        ]),
      ]),
      _c("h2", { attrs: { id: "_3-选项说明" } }, [
        _c(
          "a",
          { staticClass: "header-anchor", attrs: { href: "#_3-选项说明" } },
          [_vm._v("#")]
        ),
        _vm._v(" 3.选项说明"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("div", { staticClass: "language- extra-class" }, [
        _c("pre", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "language-text" } }, [
          _c("code", [
            _vm._v(
              "-a, --show-pause\n\t查看网卡中接收模块 RX、发送模块 TX 和 Autonegotiate 模块的状态：启动 on 或停用 off。\n-A, --pause <devname> [autoneg on|off] [rx on|off] [tx on|off]\n\t修改网卡中接收模块 RX、发送模块 TX 和 Autonegotiate 模块的状态：启动 on 或停用 off。\n-c, --show-coalesce\n\t查询指定网络设备的合并信息。\n-C, --coalesce\n\t更改指定网络设备的合并设置。\n-g, --show-ring\n\t显示指定以太网卡的 rx/tx 环参数信息。。\n-G, --set-ring\n\t更改指定以太网卡的 rx/tx 环设置。\n-i, --driver\n\t显示网卡驱动的信息，如驱动的名称、版本等。\n-d, --register-dump <devname> [raw on|off] [hex on|off] [file name]\n\t显示 register dump 信息，部分网卡驱动不支持该选项。\n-e, --eeprom-dump <devname> [raw on|off] [offset N] [length N]\n\t显示 EEPROM dump 信息，部分网卡驱动不支持该选项。\n-E, --change-eeprom\n\t修改网卡 EEPROM byte。\n-k, --show-features, --show-offload <devname>\n\t显示网卡 Offload 参数的状态：on 或 off，包括 rx-checksumming、tx-checksumming 等。\n-K, --features, --offload <devname> <feature> on|off ...\n\t修改网卡 Offload 参数的状态。\n-p, --identify <devname> [N]\n\t用于区别不同 ethX 对应网卡的物理位置，常用的方法是使网卡 port 上的 led 不断的闪；N 指示了网卡闪的持续时间，以秒为单位。\n-P, --show-permaddr\n\t向指定的网络设备查询永久硬件地址。\n-r, --negotiate <devname>\n\t如果 auto-negotiation 模块状态为 on，则 restarts auto-negotiation。\n-S, --statistics\n\t显示 NIC- and driver-specific 的统计参数，如网卡接收/发送的字节数、接收/发送的广播包个数等。\n-t, --test\n\t让网卡执行自我检测，有两种模式：offline or online。\n-s, --change\n\t修改网卡的部分配置，包括网卡速度、单工/全双工模式、MAC 地址等。\n-h, --help\n\t显示帮助信息。\n--version\n\t显示版本信息。\n"
            ),
          ]),
        ]),
      ]),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v("参数 devname 为网卡名称，可通过 ip 或 ifconfig 命令查看。"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("h2", { attrs: { id: "_4-常用示例" } }, [
        _c(
          "a",
          { staticClass: "header-anchor", attrs: { href: "#_4-常用示例" } },
          [_vm._v("#")]
        ),
        _vm._v(" 4.常用示例"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [_vm._v("（1）查询网卡基本设置。")]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("div", { staticClass: "language-shell extra-class" }, [
        _c("pre", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "language-shell" } }, [
          _c("code", [
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token function" } }, [
              _vm._v("ethtool"),
            ]),
            _vm._v(" eth0\nSettings "),
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token keyword" } }, [
              _vm._v("for"),
            ]),
            _vm._v(" eth0:\n\tLink detected: "),
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token function" } }, [
              _vm._v("yes"),
            ]),
            _vm._v("\n"),
          ]),
        ]),
      ]),
      _c("p", [_vm._v("（2）查询网卡驱动相关信息。")]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("div", { staticClass: "language-shell extra-class" }, [
        _c("pre", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "language-shell" } }, [
          _c("code", [

            ]),
            _vm._v(" "),
            _c(
              "span",
              { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token parameter variable" } },
              [_vm._v("-i")]
            ),
            _vm._v(" eth0\ndriver: virtio_net\nversion: "),
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token number" } }, [
              _vm._v("1.0"),
            ]),
            _vm._v(
              ".0\nfirmware-version: \nexpansion-rom-version: \nbus-info: 0000:00:05.0\nsupports-statistics: no\nsupports-test: no\nsupports-eeprom-access: no\nsupports-register-dump: no\nsupports-priv-flags: no\n"
            ),
          ]),
        ]),
      ]),
      _c("p", [_vm._v("（3）查询网卡收发包统计。")]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("div", { staticClass: "language-shell extra-class" }, [
        _c("pre", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "language-shell" } }, [
          _c("code", [
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token function" } }, [
              _vm._v("ethtool"),
            ]),
            _vm._v(" "),
            _c(
              "span",
              { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token parameter variable" } },
              [_vm._v("-S")]
            ),
            _vm._v(" eth0\nno stats available\n"),
          ]),
        ]),
      ]),
      _c("p", [_vm._v("（4）查询网卡注册信息。")]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("div", { staticClass: "language-shell extra-class" }, [
        _c("pre", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "language-shell" } }, [
          _c("code", [
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token function" } }, [
              _vm._v("ethtool"),
            ]),
            _vm._v(" "),
            _c(
              "span",
              { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token parameter variable" } },
              [_vm._v("-d")]
            ),
            _vm._v(
              " eth0\nCannot get register dump: Operation not supported\n"
            ),
          ]),
        ]),
      ]),
      _c("p", [_vm._v("（5）设置网卡自适应模式。")]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("div", { staticClass: "language-shell extra-class" }, [
        _c("pre", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "language-shell" } }, [
          _c("code", [
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token function" } }, [
              _vm._v("ethtool"),
            ]),
            _vm._v(" "),
            _c(
              "span",
              { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token parameter variable" } },
              [_vm._v("-r")]
            ),
            _vm._v(" eth0\n"),
          ]),
        ]),
      ]),
      _c("p", [_vm._v("（6）设置网卡速率等信息。")]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("div", { staticClass: "language-shell extra-class" }, [
        _c("pre", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "language-shell" } }, [
          _c("code", [
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token function" } }, [
              _vm._v("ethtool"),
            ]),
            _vm._v(" "),
            _c(
              "span",
              { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token parameter variable" } },
              [_vm._v("-s")]
            ),
            _vm._v(" eth0 autoneg off speed "),
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token number" } }, [
              _vm._v("100"),
            ]),
            _vm._v(" duplex full \n"),
          ]),
        ]),
      ]),
      _c("p", [_vm._v("（7）停止网卡的发送模块 TX。")]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("div", { staticClass: "language-shell extra-class" }, [
        _c("pre", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "language-shell" } }, [
          _c("code", [
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token function" } }, [
              _vm._v("ethtool"),
            ]),
            _vm._v(" "),
            _c(
              "span",
              { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token parameter variable" } },
              [_vm._v("-A")]
            ),
            _vm._v(" tx off eth0\n"),
          ]),
        ]),
      ]),
      _c("p", [_vm._v("（8）使网卡灯闪烁 10 次。")]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("div", { staticClass: "language-shell extra-class" }, [
        _c("pre", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "language-shell" } }, [
          _c("code", [
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token function" } }, [
              _vm._v("ethtool"),
            ]),
            _vm._v(" "),
            _c(
              "span",
              { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token parameter variable" } },
              [_vm._v("-p")]
            ),
            _vm._v(" eth0 "),
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token number" } }, [
              _vm._v("10"),
            ]),
            _vm._v("\n"),
          ]),
        ]),
      ]),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v("操作完毕后，看哪块网卡的 LED 灯在闪，eth0 就对应着哪块网卡。"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [_vm._v("（9）显示网卡 Offload 参数的状态。")]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("div", { staticClass: "language-shell extra-class" }, [
        _c("pre", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "language-shell" } }, [
          _c("code", [
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token function" } }, [
              _vm._v("ethtool"),
            ]),
            _vm._v(" "),
            _c(
              "span",
              { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token parameter variable" } },
              [_vm._v("-k")]
            ),
            _vm._v(" eth0\nFeatures "),
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token keyword" } }, [
              _vm._v("for"),
            ]),
            _vm._v(" eth0:\nrx-checksumming: on "),
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token punctuation" } }, [
              _vm._v("["),

            _vm._v("fixed"),
            _c("span", { pre: true, attrs: { class: "token punctuation" } }, [

            ]),

      ]),
